page.title: 10HARROLD PRIORY SCHOOL
page.content:
The school was opened in l937 as a secondary school, with one main building. Now it operates as a 9-13 middle school, with three main buildings.
In l984 there was an attempt to close the school and to 'bus'the children many miles away to another school.Fortunately an incredible number of people were completely against this move and a very successful 'Save Our School'committee was organised.
Very many people gave much of their valuable time and considerable effort to this end and we were successful in saving the school.for the moment.....
